Notes.Text:
This update for chromium to version 64.0.3282.140 fixes the following security issues:
    
- CVE-2018-6406: Various asan fixes (boo#1078463, boo#1079021)
    
The regular expression library re2 was updated to 2018-02-01.

Vulnerabilities.Description: The function ParseVP9SuperFrameIndex in common/libwebm_util.cc in libwebm through 2018-01-30 does not validate the child_frame_length data obtained from a .webm file, which allows remote attackers to cause an information leak or a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and later out-of-bounds write), or possibly have unspecified other impact.
